Test: Create workspace card is understandable and complete in EN.
Create workspace card is understandable and complete in IT.
Field validation messages are visible and actionable.
Step navigation (`Back`/`Next`) is predictable and non-blocking when valid.
Auto-save/draft resume behavior is visible and understandable.
Secondary tabs (`General`, `Business activities`, `Members`, `AI library`) are discoverable and clearly named.
`General` tab supports rename/image/update with clear feedback.
`General` delete-workspace flow communicates risk and confirmation correctly.
`Business activities` forms are scannable and AI assist actions are clear.
`Members` list + invite statuses (`pending/accepted/declined/expired/revoked`) are easy to read.
Invite actions (`resend`, `revoke`) are discoverable and confirmed by feedback.
`AI library` document/knowledge tabs are understandable with useful empty states.
Left sidebar information architecture is understandable (`Business Plan`, `Canvas Models`, `Pitch Deck`, `Finance`).
Top-level manage tabs (`Plan`, `Download`) are clear and consistent.
Active page/tab states are visually obvious.
`Plan Chapters` and `Plan Tasks` can be used without ambiguity.
Task statuses (`todo/in_progress/done`) are easy to interpret.
`Ask AI to Draft` affordance is understandable and gives visible outcome.
AI chat pending-change cards (`accept/reject`) are clear and actionable.
Editing section content is straightforward for common section types.
Canvas template selection grid is understandable and clickable on first pass.
Canvas edit page actions (`Ask AI`, `Download`, add/edit item) are discoverable.
Pitch template grid + create flow is clear.
Pitch editor action layout does not have button collisions/overlap.
Slide edit / AI actions provide immediate feedback.
Export actions are easy to find in Business Plan, Pitch, and Canvas pages.
Export format choices are clearly labeled and consistent.
Loading/progress states prevent duplicate actions.
Success/failure toasts are specific and useful.
No P1 layout break on desktop common widths.
No P1 layout break on mobile common widths.
Keyboard focus order is reasonable on core action paths.
Interactive controls have obvious enabled/disabled states.
